hero.title: Magani Na IT Na Ƙirƙira
hero.subtitle: A Birnin Zinder
hero.description: GremahTech kamfani ne na farko a Nijar wanda muke ba da sabbin magunguna na gina yanar gizo, kare bayanai, da hanyoyin sadarwa don inganta kasuwancin ku ta hanyar dijital.

about.title: Game da GremahTech
about.subtitle: Ƙirƙira da Ingantacciyar Aiki
about.description: An kafa mu a Zinder, GremahTech ƙwararren kamfani ne na IT wanda ke ba da ingantattun magungunan fasaha. Muna haɗa ƙwarewar gida da ƙa'idodin duniya don taimaka wa 'yan kasuwa su bunƙasa a zamanin dijital.
about.missionText: Ƙarfafa 'yan kasuwa a Nijar da sauran ƙasashe tare da magungunan IT na ƙirƙira waɗanda ke haifar da ci gaba da sauya kasuwancin su ta dijital.
about.visionText: Mu zama babban mai bayar da magungunan IT a Yammacin Afirka, wanda aka sani da inganci, ƙirƙira, da gamsar da abokan ciniki.
about.valuesText: Ƙirƙira, aminci, inganci, da sanya abokin ciniki a tsaki, su ne abin da muke bi yayin da muke gina makomar fasaha a Nijar.

services.title: Ayyukanmu
services.subtitle: Cikakkun magungunan IT don tura kasuwancin ku zuwa gaba
services.technologiesTitle: Fasahohin da Muke Amfani da su

cta.title: Shirye kake don sauya kasuwancin ku?
cta.description: Bari mu tattauna yadda ayyukanmu zasu iya taimaka muku cimma burin fasahar ku.

webDev.title: Gina Yanar Gizo
webDev.description: Keɓaɓɓun gidajen yanar gizo da aikace-aikacen yanar gizo da aka gina tare da fasahohin zamani da ƙirar amsawa.

frontend.title: Gina Fuskar Shafi (Frontend)
features: Kula da shi na watanni 3 kyauta

mobileDev.title: Gina Aikace-aikacen Wayar Hannu
mobileDev.description: Aikace-aikacen wayar hannu na iOS da Android, an inganta su don aiki da ƙwarewar mai amfani.

android.title: Gina Aikace-aikacen Android
features: Ya dace da na'urori da yawa

networking.title: Sadarwa & Kayayyakin More Rayuwa
networking.description: Kafa, daidaitawa, da inganta hanyoyin sadarwa na ƙwararru ga 'yan kasuwa kowane girma.

cybersecurity.title: Kare Bayanai Ta Yanar Gizo
cybersecurity.description: Cikakkun magunguna don kare kadarorin ku na dijital da bayanai masu mahimmanci daga barazanar yanar gizo.

graphicDesign.title: Zane
graphicDesign.description: Ƙirƙirar alamun gani masu tasiri da ƙira mai sauƙin fahimta da kyau.

videoEditing.title: Gyara Bidiyo
videoEditing.description: Ƙirƙirar bidiyo na ƙwararru da gyara bidiyo don yaƙin neman zaɓe da sadarwar ku.

ceo.name: Mahamadou Amadou Habou Gremah
ceo.description: Shugaba mai hangen nesa tare da ƙwarewa a dabarun IT da haɓaka kasuwanci.

developer.name: Issoufou Jigo Abdouraheem
developer.description: Ƙwararren mai haɓakawa wanda ya ƙware a fasahohin yanar gizo na zamani da magunguna.

contact.title: Tuntube Mu
contact.subtitle: Bari Mu Gina Wani Abu Mai Ban Al'ajabi Tare
contact.name: Sunanka

footer.description: GremahTech kamfani ne na farko a Zinder wanda ke ba da magungunan fasaha na ƙirƙira.
footer.rights: Duk haƙƙoƙin suna tare da mu.
